description:
Riichi Mahjong Calculator, featuring hand efficiency calculation, and more.
Riichi Mahjong Calculator, supporting features such as hand
efficiency, meld hand efficiency, winning hand analysis,
and score calculation for fan and minipoints.

- Hand Efficiency: Includes tile efficiency, good-shape tile
 efficiency (for one-shanten only), and backwards strategy.

- Meld Hand Efficiency: Tile efficiency for chow, pung, kong,
and pass; includes good-shape tile efficiency (for one-shanten only)
and backwards strategy.

- Winning Hand Analysis: Defaults to Mahjong Soul/Tenhou rules,
 with customizable rules to some extent.

- Score Calculation By Fan and Minipoints: Defaults to Mahjong Soul/Tenhou
 rules, with customizable rules to some extent.
